archimate:Requirement.name: R17.1 Status of materials is clearly marked, Last review date is clearly marked, Review process & intervals is included on the material/material location
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
Security Awareness project requirement for support material
U30 As all users I need to know that the material is properly maintained (if it was reviewed and when, last reviewed date and the status of it: e.g. approved) to be able to trust that the information is correct.
